biotools.summary: Search for homologous protein binding sites structures in the Protein Data Bank. The tool allows an automated assembly and preprocessing of protein structure ensembles supporting protein flexibility and point mutation analyses as well as structure-based virtual screening.

bioschemas.name: SIENA
bioschemas.summary: Search for homologous protein binding sites structures in the Protein Data Bank. The tool allows an automated assembly and preprocessing of protein structure ensembles supporting protein flexibility and point mutation analyses as well as structure-based virtual screening.
